name: ListYubikeyOtpTokens
description:
Lists all YubiKey OTP tokens in the organization.

Use this tool to retrieve all YubiKey OTP tokens associated with the organization. It helps in managing and auditing YubiKey token deployments.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_for_next_page
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of YubiKey OTP tokens.

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of tokens

parameters.name: expand_user_resource
parameters.description: Set to 'user' to embed the User resource if assigned to a YubiKey token.

value_schema.description: Embeds the [user](/openapi/okta-management/management/tag/User/) resource if the YubiKey token is assigned to a user and `expand` is set to `user`

parameters.name: filter_tokens_by
parameters.description: Filter expression to narrow down tokens (e.g., by email, serial, status, etc.).

value_schema.description: The expression used to filter tokens

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of YubiKey OTP tokens returned per page.

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of results per page

parameters.name: sort_tokens_by
parameters.description: Specify how to sort the YubiKey tokens. Options: profile.email, profile.serial, activated, user.id, created, status, lastVerified.

value_schema.description: The value of how the tokens are sorted

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specifies the sort order for the YubiKey OTP tokens, either `ASC` for ascending or `DESC` for descending.

value_schema.description: Specifies the sort order, either `ASC` or `DESC`

parameters.name: download_as_csv
parameters.description: Set to True to return tokens as a downloadable CSV. The default limit changes to 1000.

value_schema.description: Returns tokens in a CSV to download instead of in the response. When you use this query parameter, the `limit` default changes to 1000.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of tokens

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of tokens

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Embeds the [user](/openapi/okta-management/management/tag/User/) resource if the YubiKey token is assigned to a user and `expand` is set to `user`

value_schema.description: Embeds the [user](/openapi/okta-management/management/tag/User/) resource if the YubiKey token is assigned to a user and `expand` is set to `user`

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The expression used to filter tokens

value_schema.description: The expression used to filter tokens

parameters.name: forDownload
parameters.description: Returns tokens in a CSV to download instead of in the response. When you use this query parameter, the `limit` default changes to 1000.

value_schema.description: Returns tokens in a CSV to download instead of in the response. When you use this query parameter, the `limit` default changes to 1000.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results per page

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of results per page

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: The value of how the tokens are sorted

value_schema.description: The value of how the tokens are sorted

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies the sort order, either `ASC` or `DESC`

value_schema.description: Specifies the sort order, either `ASC` or `DESC`

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
